title: Feel Again
description: What if she’s always been enough?Warped by the trauma in her past, Willa is sure she lacks what it takes to be a forever kind of girl. While she might fantasize about happily ever after, it is just that: a fantasy.No matter how her pulse races when her tender, brooding Viking whispers promises and possibilities to her broken heart.But when crisis hits he's there, and Willa takes comfort in his strength.He sees more than she thinks.She’s complicated, but his goals are simple.Happily ever after is theirs for the taking.Will she see she deserves it or will she break both their hearts?Content Warning: Abortion trauma, PTSD, narcissistic abuse.
author: Devin Sloane
